54. $(y-2)(x-y)=0\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{l} y-2=0,\\ x-y=0.\end{array}\right.\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{l} y=2,\\ y=x.\end{array}\right.$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{task054-solution-fig1}
